description: Aaruush 2023 redefined innovation with 100+ events, workshops on forensics, blockchain, and Pro-Nite by Nikhil D'Souza!
The 16th Aaruush in 2022 returned offline with 100+ events, headlined by Vivek Desai, Raag, When Chai Met Toast, and Sahil Shah.
Aaruush 2021, the 15th edition, featured Shajo Titus, Ninad Deshpande, and more in its Unconference and Conclave.
In 2020, Aaruush went online, inaugurated by Dr. V K Aatre, with Nishant Suri headlining the comedy night.
tagline: The Future: A Journey Into Tomorrow

description: Aaruush 2019 featured Dr. V Natarajan as the chief guest, with Abhishek Upmanyu, Arjun Kanungo, and Pakizah performing.
Aaruush 2018, inaugurated by Dr. A.S. Kiran Kumar, featured Varun Thakur, Attva, and The Local Train in key events.
In 2017, Aaruush gained UNESCO Patronage, with Retd. General V.K. Singh inaugurating and Mira Erda, Arjun Vajpai speaking.
In 2016, Aaruush celebrated its 10th edition with T-Summit, featuring Dilip Chhabria, WittyFeed founders, Nikhil D'Souza, and Kenny Sebastian.
In 2015, Aaruush featured Dr. V. K. Saraswat, Anand Kumar, Shradha Sharma, and dynamic CEOs Sanjay and Shravan, with a stellar performance by Agnee.
In 2014, Aaruush hosted Dr. K. Kasturirangan and Sam Pitroda, unveiled the Arjun Mark-II Tank, and had Dr. Eesa Mohammad Basatki at the Valedictory Ceremony.
In 2013, Aaruush featured Dr. Tessy Thomas, Krispian Lawrence, and Aakash Sinha for guest lectures and hosted its first hacktrack.
In 2012, Aaruush featured Rajan Anandan and Richard Stallman, and launched Swastika, a national-level school quiz competition.
In 2011, Aaruush was recognized by international organizations including IEEE, DRDO, PETA, WWF, and the European Space Agency.
In 2010, Aaruush hosted renowned author Chetan Bhagat for the Main Quiz and featured the Arjuna Tank of the Indian Army.
Apart from achieving nationwide participation, Aaruush transformed into a Techno-Management Fest in the year 2009.
Aaruush transcended into a National Level Technological Fest in 2008. The fest had over 4500 participants.
Aaruush, inaugurated in 2007 by Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, thrives on his words: "Innovation will guide you through.
